sentences.en: " Par in parem imperium non habet " is an indisputable legal maxim in the world.
sentences.cn: 平等者之间无 统治权,这是国际上不容争辩的一项法律格言.

sentences.en: " Waste not, want not " is her favourite maxim.
sentences.cn: “ 不浪费则不匮乏 ” 是她喜爱的格言.

sentences.en: Gaston and Liane are joining me here at Maxim's tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚加斯顿和兰妮会来马克西姆之家找我.

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim 'if it ain't broke, don't fix it'.
sentences.cn: 我相信这样一条箴言：“不破不修”。

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it."
sentences.cn: 我相信这句格言：“如果它没坏，不要去修理它。”

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it".
sentences.cn: 我相信这样一条箴言：“不破不修”。

sentences.en: I was wondering whether to go upstairs or whether to follow Maxim to the library.
sentences.cn: 我正不知是否该上楼,还是该跟马克西姆去图书馆.

sentences.en: In Maxim's, everybody minds his own business.
sentences.cn: 在马克西姆之家, 人人自得其乐.

sentences.en: Maxim seems to be particularly fond of her.
sentences.cn: 马西姆似乎特别喜欢她.

sentences.en: Of the wisdom of this maxim Mr. Slope was ignorant.
sentences.cn: 斯洛普先生对这句至理名言的明智之处一无所知.

sentences.en: Please lay the maxim to your heart.
The list of maxim is not settled.
sentences.cn: 格言的内容不完全固定.

sentences.en: This was a maxim well understood by Turloch.
sentences.cn: 这是特洛克心领神会的格言.

sentences.en: Whenever I get the chance I go to Maxim's for dinner.
sentences.cn: 我一有机会便去马克西姆餐厅吃饭。

sentences.en: Why not consult your little book and meet me at Maxim's tonight?
sentences.cn: 看看书解解闷晚上来马克西姆之家找我 怎么样 ?

trans.tran_en: a well-known phrase or saying, especially one that gives a rule for sensible behaviour
